column4: can someone help me mount some NTFS drives in linux? im trying to recover some data on some hd's
my windows installation went to shit and im using the ubuntu livecd to get access to the computer, but i cant mount the NTFS drives
when i go the computer browser, and click a device, it says its cant mount it with the message, "error: device /dev/hda1 is not mountable  error: could not execute pmount"
there should be a Disks applet in the Administration menu
